sourceDesc.p: Journal was created by speaker Tisu during his trip to Vienna 03rd-14th August 2017.

normalization.ab: Where there was a spelling by the author which separately wrote two items that should be written as one (such as future (potential) prefixes in front of a verb, these are wrapped in a common w and the norm is used to show the normalized value (without) whitespace.

Where the original did not follow spelling conventions and no white-space was involved and the items were changed to reflect the most up-to-date orthography conventions and the original form written by Tisu is recorded in the orig.

list.item: Spanish translations are defined in relation to their Mixtec equivalents in the following locations: //div/p/spanGrp[@type='translation']/span[xml:lang='es'] (where preceding sibling is //seg) and //div/salute (where preceding sibling is //seg[@xml:lang='mix']); in both the value of //span[@target] is the pointer to the Mixtec translation equivalent

listChange.change: Normalization of original text are being made in //w[@norm]. Where two items (such as a verb and prefix) are written by Tisu separately, the separate w's are being wrapped in common w and this is where the translation will point to and the @norm attribute will be entered.

spanGrp.span: My friend Donny came over around 3:30 to pick us up then drove to the other metro called BART.
Then we got out of car, me and Shanty then got onto the metro.
Shanty came with me to the S.F airport.
Shanty vino conmigo al aeropuerto de S.F.
When we got in Donny's car, he said that it's very nice where I am going to go to.
He told me to be careful.
I should ask for direction so that someone doesn't steel my things.
Yo debería preguntar direcciónes para que alguien no me robe mis cosas.
When we arrived at BART we paid and got on the train.
It took us an hour to get to the airport.
Nos hizó una hora para llegar al aeropuerto.
When we arrived, we looked for Air Berlin.
Cuando llegamos, buscamos para Air Berlin.
When we found it then I spoke to the lady to get the ticket to board the plane.
After I got my boarding pass, I went to the other window so that the person could checked in my bag.
Then I went through security; I took off my shoes, I took out my computer, I took out the bag, I took out everything that I was carrying with me.
When I was done checking my bag, I walked through.
Then I was sitting down wating for the plane to arrive.
And then I was hungry so I went to buy something to eat.
Then the plane arrived around 8pm and I boarded and it took off and left for Germany.
It must have been flying for about an hour then I fell asleep.
I must have slept around four to seven hours but the flight lasted around eleven hours before we arrived in Vienna.
I arrived in Vienna around eight thirty.
The plane must have flown ten hours before it arrived in the city called Dusseldorf, Germany.
When I arrived there I got out of the plan then I went to the other area to catch the plane to go to Vienna.
I walked for around twenty minutes and then I arrived at the other area, then (?) around two and a half hours.

p.seg:
Ncha yachi kua ka iñu-sava sana
ni kitsaa
avión ka .

spanGrp.span: It wasn't until nearly about six thirty before the plane arrived.
Then I got on the plane and I went to sleep (?)
The plane flew around one hour and twenty five minutes and it arrived in Vienna around eight.
Then I got out of the plane then I walked and came out because I requested a car to pick me up and take me (?) to the hotel Regina.
When I came out of the airport I looked for where the agent was.
Then I walked and looked for them.
Then I found the agent after about 3 minutes, because he had my name written on a sign hung around his net so that I could see that that was the right man.
Then we left the airport and got in the car and drove (?) and arrived at the Hotel Regina.
Then I arrived at the hotel Regina and we took out my things and I walked to ask for the key to get in the room.
Then I changed clothes and I went to get something to eat.
Right now I ate and I really want to sleep i'm very tired from sitting down on the airplane.
Then I went into my room and I slept for about eight hours.
When I got up,my back hurt from sitting down on the airplane.
And because of how bad my back was irritating, I wasn't able to sleep well on the plane.
Y por causa de como dolía la espalde, no pudo dormir bien en el aeroplano.
I was not able to sleep

p.seg: Ntakoo kua ka iñu-sava cha ma nikuu ka ntakusu yu .

spanGrp.span: I woke up around six thirty and couldn't go back to sleep.
I couldn't go back to sleep
I woke up, then took a shower, brushed my teeth, combed my hair, and got dressed.
Then I ate at the cafeteria.
I ate some food, such as eggs, and bacon.
Then I drank water and a small coffee (espresso).
Then after I ate I strolled around the area of my hotel.
When I was walking around nearby there (the hotel), I saw that there was a very big building.
It was a church and people were going inside and looking at it.
And when I was sitting down, I saw that some people were arriving with a dog.
The dog was very small, it was not a very big dog at all.
And right now I'm waiting for Jack to get here with his wife because they know where where we are going to go walk around.
And I sat down on a bench when I got there.
And I saw on my watch that it was exactly ten o'clock.
Then they arrived and we walked off and went.
We walked and (now?) we arrived at a building that looked like a church and Jack said that this building is the house of the government.
Then we walked and we will go to the center of this city of Vienna.
And then we arrived at a café.
And then we arrived at a place where people sell café and bread.
And then we were going to order something to eat.
When we were done, we packed up and left.
We walked and we saw a building and by then two hours had passed.
I saw another church and a building that used to be a palace and one that is a palace now.
There were a lot of people walking around.
There there was a restaurant where we went to eat.
All three of us ordered chicken.
Then when we were done we walked back to the hotel.
It was about 4 o'clock when we got back here to the hotel.
When I arrived at where we were going to meet and I started to wait for him.

p.seg: Sa chuun kue kua ncha ka iin (1), sara ntsatsi kue ña takuan kue .
Cha ñaka tsatsi kue ta kua ka iin (1).
Sa chuun kue , ra ncha kua ka u'un (5) sava sana tsike kue nuu chuun .
Sara ta kua ka utsi iin (11) ra ni kixi yuu .
Ta ntsa nkuku kua (kwa) ka iin (9) ra nikitsa kue sa chuun kue .
Ta ntachiko kue oficina ka sa chuun kue ra tsa ni kui ka uvi tsa'un (2 : 15).
Sa chuun kue , ra ncha kua ka u'un (5) sava sana tsike kue nuu chuun .
Cha nikitsa yu/ntachi'ko ika kua ka utsa sava .
Kua ka iin (9) ra ntachiko hotel ka , tsi ntu'un nuu lulu .
Sara ta kua ka utsi iin (11) ra ni kixi yuu .
Ni ka nuu treen ka kua ka iin (9) tsa'un (15), takua na ko tiempo yu ku kaka nuu nu yav'I ka .
Kua ka utsi iin (11), nuu kue tsa'an kue takuan paa ña katsi tsi salami ka .
Sara ta kua ka utsi iin-sava , (11 : 30) ra ni kixi yuu .
Mi chu'tni tsa kui ka uun-sava (5 : 30), kua oko ka minutu ra ku nkee kue nuu chuun yo'o .
Mi chu'tni tsika kue kuan kue , tsa kua tsaun-minutu tsika .
Tsa ni keta utsi-minutu cha ni ki tsa cha yo'o tsi nchai vichi .
Cha ku nkui ka iin (9) tsi kuaa .
Cha tsa ku kui kua ka utsi-sava .
Ti kua ka utsi-in ra ku nu'u yu .
Kui kua ka iin-sava cha ku ntaki'in kue sa'ma cha ku nke hotel yo'o ri ku nkuun yu kuntasi'a ña nuu ve'e Jack ka .
Cha vichi tsa kui ka utsi-sava , cha tsa ntachiko kue nuu nani Karlsplatz , sara sana ku nkuun kue ntatuku kue biblioteca ka .
-Na ko'on chi nta'a sachi , ri chi su'a inka biblioteca ka .
Chi nta'a ku'a tsi chi nta'a sachi , in (there is) ve'e na'un , ve'e yata .
-Yo'o yeeh nchai va'a , yeeh ña nani “Hot dog/perro caliente .
” Ana kuni katsi in “hot dog'?.
-Cha ma katsi ña ri ntsatsi ña ta iku ñuun .
Cha kue va'a tsatsia- Ni kachi yuu .
-Na nko'o nuu inka ña'a ka ra ntaka tuun ko chi katu'u tutu yo'o .
Cha ntaka tuun Casandra ka , ra kachi ña'a yo'o ña inka biblioteca ka ku nuu katu'u tutu-codices .
In kii ndavi chau'a ku vich ri ma ni ku kunche tutu ña cha nivi ko tsa keta u'un-cientu kia .
Mi chut'ni , me , ku nku'un tienda sara ku nku'un yuu kunchee in “Palacio” ña nani Schobrunn .
Cha tsa kui ka in-sava ra ku nkuun yuu nu inka in ve'e , in palacio ña nani Schonbrunn .
Treen yo'o ra ku ntsai kua oko-minuto .
Ra yee in(1) hora ni kaka nuu ri tsini ñu'u ña intaki nta'an tsi Jack ka tsi Casandra ka kumi .
Tsika na kunchee sati , cha ta ni ki tsa yuu yo'o ra ka'un ka kuu tuku sati , inka “Jardin”, inka chikui , kaa tiutsa .
Tsa kui ka utsi-tsau'un schana'a , cha yo'o inka yuu ntakuan paa tsi café .
Mi chut'ni tsa kui kua ka in-sava tsini .
Ntakuan kua nchu'a “bolsa”.
Cha yachi tsa ku nkui ka uvi-sava , ra kuu nuu , ku nkue nuu treen yo vichi .
Kue “calli” yo'o ra in(there is) ve'e na'nu , inka tiutsa na'nu , ntee chu'a saa .
Nta chi kaa kue ntsita kue , nta chi kaa kue chamarra kue , sara naa kue in “botella” chikuii .
Tsika kue kuan kue , in loma luluu kui , tsika kue ri ncha shini (top) loma ku kuun kue .
Ntsa kue nu in “letrero ,” ntakani ña yee sa'va , yee likwi (toad), yee chumi , yee taka , yee ntikuain , yee ntiva'u , tsi inka kue itsi ña tsini yuu nishi nani .
Tsa kui ka kumi-sava cha tsa tsika kue ntachiko un inka ye'e ka , nu tsini kue kini yuku .
